result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael L. ALLOWAY was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • PTC possess cocaine [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.
The Court orders expungement under Section 973.015 upon successful completion of the sentence.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The matter is continued for a plea date on 12-16-15 at 11:30 a.m.  Court modifies bail to $50.00 cash bond with the same conditions as previously ordered.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the county jail.  Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail Issued.  Copy filed.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.

Minutes.
RE:  PTC possess cocaine, on 03-03-15.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of possess cocaine.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 03-23-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, maintain absolute sobriety and have no contact with Tia Marie Gilligan.   Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
